# Emotion-Detection
This repository contains a deep learning model for detecting emotions from facial images. The model is trained using a pretrained model architecture and fine tuned and can classify emotions such as happiness, sadness, anger, surprise, and more. It is designed to analyze facial expressions in images and predict the corresponding emotion.

# Features
Emotion Classification: Detects emotions like happy, sad, angry, neutral, surprise, etc.

Deep Learning Model: Built using TensorFlow with a pretrained model MobileNetV2 architecture.

Easy-to-Use: Simple pipeline for training, testing, and predicting emotions from new images.

Customizable: Supports custom datasets and model fine-tuning.
